itemInfo.itemDesc: A ring decorated with a Resplendent Ruby.

item.name: Ruby Ring
item.desc: A ring decorated with a Ruby.

item.name: Melted Platinum Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Platinum Ore.

item.name: Ruby
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding a Rough Ruby.

item.name: Blood Ruby Ring
item.desc: A ring decorated with a Blood Ruby.
